title: Sprouted Chickpea Hummus Recipe
full_text:
Sprouted Chickpea Hummus Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Makes
2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cups
sprouted
chickpeas
, raw or cooked
2
tablespoons
tahini
1
tablespoon
lemon juice
1
clove
clove garlic
, minced
1/2
cup
extra virgin olive oil
1 to 1 ½
teaspoons
Kosher salt
(to taste)
Directions
Place chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic in bowl of a food processor. Pulse until well-processed.
Drizzle olive oil through feed tube while food processor is running.
Salt to taste. Serve immediately or refrigerate.
Special Equipment
Food processor
Mediterranean
Dairy-free Snacks & Appetizers
Gluten-free Snacks & Appetizers
Vegan Snacks & Appetizers
Vegetarian Snacks & Appetizers
